name: Healthyfied White Christmas Salad
description: This Healthyfied White Christmas Salad is a festive treat for anyone looking to enjoy the holidays while keeping it low-carb but not compromising on flavor. With a high-sodium profile, it’s perfect for those who are keeping an eye on their carb intake but love a flavorful salad. This salad combines the crispiness of radishes with the sweetness of tomatoes and the sharp tang of red onion, all seasoned to perfection. It’s a celebration of healthy recipes that don’t skimp on taste!

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the radish, tomatoes, red bell pepper, and red onion under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the radish, tomatoes, red bell pepper, and slice the red onion thinly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large salad bowl, combine the diced radish, tomatoes, red bell pepper, and sliced onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Season the salad with salt and pepper, then toss well to ensure the vegetables are evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
